description.raw:
* Needs https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-launch/pull-requests/39/window-icon/diff
* Nice to have https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/222/window-icon/diff

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3115933918-subticon.png)
---

Turned all the launch files into `.in` and now they're configured by cmake before being installed. The files are exactly the same, except for this line that has been added to some of them:

`<window_icon>@CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX@/@CATKIN_PACKAGE_SHARE_DESTINATION@/images/SubT-logo_notext_color.png</window_icon>`

This allows us to pass the full path of the installed icon to the final file. For example, on my system, the icon is populated with:

`<window_icon>/home/developer/ws/install/share/subt_ign/images/SubT-logo_notext_color.png</window_icon>`

This allows us to pass the full path of the installed icon to the final file. For example, on my system, the icon is populated with:
